籤詩版本二:
Once upon a time, the boat lost its needle
Still searching in the sea today
If the original needle is found,
It takes time and effort
詩意: This hexagram is like looking for a needle in the sea. Everything requires hard work.
解曰: Fortune is the basis of fortune. Lu is the seed of blessing. Explain clearly. It is advisable to be cautious.
籤詩故事一:
◇Huang Xiaozi searched for his relatives for thousands of miles
Huang Juejing was from Jianchang. When he was five years old, he lost his mother due to war. After a while, he vowed to heaven to recite Buddhist scriptures in order to find his mother. Then he crossed the Huaihe River and went begging. He braved the wind and rain and endured hardships. After twenty-eight years, he arrived at Chundian, Liang County, Ruzhou, where he finally found his mother and returned.
聖意:
The house is in debt.
Beware of yourself.
